title: Linked Trust - A Decentralized Opinion Platform
details: Led the development of a decentralized platform where users express opinions through claims, fostering collaborative discourse within interconnected nodes.
author: Sahda Samier

title: Magdi Yacoub Heart Foundation - Hospital Management System
details: Contributed to developing a hospital registration and patient management system to enhance healthcare administration.
author: Sahda Samier

title: Decentralized LinkedIn - A Web3 Professional Network
details: Developed a decentralized professional network allowing users to showcase portfolios, connect, and receive evaluations.
author: Sahda Samier

title: What's Cookin' - A Decentralized Ecosystem
details: As a front-end developer, I contributed to the development of this decentralized ecosystem by resolving bugs and implementing new features to enhance the user experience.
author: Sahda Samier

title: Tic Tac Toe - Multiplayer Game
details: Developed a web-based Tic Tac Toe game with multiplayer and AI opponent functionality.
author: Sahda Samier

title: In Symphony - Social Media Platform
details: Developed a social media application that allows users to create, like, and remove posts.
author: Sahda Samier

title: Task Canvas - To-Do List Application
details: Developed a to-do list application with task organization into completed, uncompleted, and all tabs.
author: Sahda Samier

title: Quill Quotient - Blogging Platform
details: Developed a blogging platform where users can create and publish blog posts.
author: Sahda Samier
